component.name: resetIsinCode
component.notice: ISIN code of derivative contracts "(EX)" will reset all except \r\nthose specified in the "ExContractIsinCode" area (New contract isin code (Ex))

component.name: cumCNoAdjusted
component.notice:
Ex: AAA For the CUM contract symbol equal to . AAA there is no adjustment
Ex: AAA|BBB For the CUM contract symbol equal to . AAA there is no adjustment . BBB there is no adjustment

component.name: exCSymbol
component.notice:
Ex: old=AAA;new=YYY For the CUM contract symbol equal to . AAA then EX will be equal to YYY
Ex: old=AAA|BBB|CCC;new=YYY|ZZZ|##UNDO## For the CUM contract symbol equal to . AAA then EX will be equal to YYY . BBB then EX will be equal to ZZZ . CCC then the derivative contract (EX) will NOT be created.

component.name: exUnl
component.notice:
Additional information for "DisplayName", "Symbol" and "RelatedSymbol" columns for Underlyer (ExAdj)
Ex: isin=US0000000001;dsn=AAA shares - Class A;sym=AAA;rsym=YYY For the underlyer isin equal to US0000000001 then EXADJ . DisplayName will be equal to AAA shares - Class A . Symbol will be equal to AAA . Related symbol will be equal to YYY
Ex: isin=US0000000001|US0000000002;dsn=AAA shares - Class A|dsn=BBB shares - Class C;sym=AAA|BBB;rsym=YYY|ZZZ For the underlyer isin equal to US0000000001 then EXADJ . DisplayName will be equal to AAA shares - Class A . Symbol will be equal to AAA . Related symbol will be equal to YYY
For the underlyer isin equal to US0000000002 then EXADJ . DisplayName will be equal to BBB shares - Class C . Symbol will be equal to BBB . Related symbol will be equal to ZZZ

component.name: exCt
component.notice:
Additional information for "UnderlyerIsin" , "DisplayName", "Isin" , "ContractSize" and "ContractMultiplier" columns for contract (ExAdj)
Ex: sym=AAA;unlisin=US1234567890;dsn=AAA - Class A;isin=US0000000001;csize=1000;cmul=1000 For the ex contract symbol equal to AAA then EX . Underlyer isin code will be equal to US1234567890 . DisplayName will be equal to AAA - Class A . Isin code will be equal to US0000000001 . Contract size symbol will be equal to 1000 . Contract multiplier symbol will be equal to 1000
Ex: sym=AAA|BBB;unlisin=US1234567890|US1234567891;dsn=AAA - Class A|BBB - Class C;isin=US0000000001|US0000000002;csize=1000|100;cmul=1000|100 For the ex contract symbol equal to AAA then EX . Underlyer isin code will be equal to US1234567890 . DisplayName will be equal to AAA - Class A . Isin code will be equal to US0000000001 . Contract size symbol will be equal to 1000 . Contract multiplier symbol will be equal to 1000
For the ex contract symbol equal to BBB then EX . Underlyer isin code will be equal to US1234567891 . DisplayName will be equal to BBB - Class A . Isin code will be equal to US0000000002 . Contract size symbol will be equal to 100 . Contract multiplier symbol will be equal to 100

component.name: exAdjCSymbol
component.notice:
Ex: old=AAA;new=YYY For the CUM contract symbol equal to . AAA then EXADJ will be equal to YYY
Ex: old=AAA|BBB;new=YYY|ZZZ For the CUM contract symbol equal to . AAA then EXADJ will be equal to YYY . BBB then EXADJ will be equal to ZZZ

component.name: exAdjUnl
component.notice:
Additional information for "DisplayName", "Symbol" and "RelatedSymbol" columns for Underlyer (ExAdj)
Ex: isin=US0000000001;dsn=AAA shares - Class A;sym=AAA;rsym=YYY For the underlyer isin equal to US0000000001 then EXADJ . DisplayName will be equal to AAA shares - Class A . Symbol will be equal to AAA . Related symbol will be equal to YYY
Ex: isin=US0000000001|US0000000002;dsn=AAA shares - Class A|dsn=BBB shares - Class C;sym=AAA|BBB;rsym=YYY|ZZZ For the underlyer isin equal to US0000000001 then EXADJ . DisplayName will be equal to AAA shares - Class A . Symbol will be equal to AAA . Related symbol will be equal to YYY
For the underlyer isin equal to US0000000002 then EXADJ . DisplayName will be equal to BBB shares - Class C . Symbol will be equal to BBB . Related symbol will be equal to ZZZ

component.name: exAdjCt
component.notice:
Additional information for "UnderlyerIsin", "DisplayName", "Isin" , "ContractSize" and "ContractMultiplier columns for contract (ExAdj)
Ex: sym=AAA;unlisin=US1234567890;dsn=AAA - Class A;isin=US0000000001;csize=1000;cmul=1000 For the ex contract symbol equal to AAA then EXADJ . Underlyer isin code will be equal to US1234567890 . DisplayName will be equal to AAA - Class A . Isin code will be equal to US0000000001 . Contract size symbol will be equal to 1000 . Contract multiplier symbol will be equal to 1000
Ex: sym=AAA|BBB;unlisin=US1234567890|US1234567891;dsn=AAA - Class A|BBB - Class C;isin=US0000000001|US0000000002;csize=;cmul= For the ex contract symbol equal to AAA then EXADJ . Underlyer isin code will be equal to US1234567890 . DisplayName will be equal to AAA - Class A . Isin code will be equal to US0000000001 . Contract size and contract multiplier are not specified
For the ex contract symbol equal to BBB then EXADJ . Underlyer isin code will be equal to US1234567891 . DisplayName will be equal to BBB - Class A . Isin code will be equal to US0000000002 . Contract size and contract multiplier are not specified

component.name: exRecCSymbol
component.notice:
Ex: old=AAA;new=YYY For the CUM contract symbol equal to . AAA then EX RECYCLED will be equal to YYY
Ex: old=AAA|BBB;new=YYY|ZZZ For the CUM contract symbol equal to . AAA then EX RECYCLED will be equal to YYY . BBB then EX RECYCLED will be equal to ZZZ

component.name: exRecUnl
component.notice:
Additional information for "DisplayName", "Symbol" and "RelatedSymbol" columns for Underlyer (Recycled)
Ex: isin=US0000000001;dsn=AAA shares - Class A;sym=AAA;rsym=YYY For the underlyer isin equal to US0000000001 then RECYCLED . DisplayName will be equal to AAA shares - Class A . Symbol will be equal to AAA . Related symbol will be equal to YYY
Ex: isin=US0000000001|US0000000002;dsn=AAA shares - Class A|dsn=BBB shares - Class C;sym=AAA|BBB;rsym=YYY|ZZZ For the underlyer isin equal to US0000000001 then RECYCLED . DisplayName will be equal to AAA shares - Class A . Symbol will be equal to AAA . Related symbol will be equal to YYY
For the underlyer isin equal to US0000000002 then RECYCLED . DisplayName will be equal to BBB shares - Class C . Symbol will be equal to BBB . Related symbol will be equal to ZZZ

component.name: exRecCt
component.notice:
Additional information for "UnderlyerIsin" , "DisplayName", "Isin" , "ContractSize" and "ContractMultiplier" columns for contract (ExAdj)
Ex: sym=AAA;unlisin=US1234567890;dsn=AAA - Class A;isin=US0000000001;csize=1000;cmul=1000 For the ex recycled contract symbol equal to AAA then EX RECYCLED . Underlyer isin code will be equal to US1234567890 . DisplayName will be equal to AAA - Class A . Isin code will be equal to US0000000001 . Contract size symbol will be equal to 1000 . Contract multiplier symbol will be equal to 1000
Ex: sym=AAA|BBB;unlisin=US1234567890|US1234567891;dsn=AAA - Class A|BBB - Class C;isin=US0000000001|US0000000002;csize=1000|100;cmul=1000|100 For the ex recycled contract symbol equal to AAA then EX RECYCLED . Underlyer isin code will be equal to US1234567890 . DisplayName will be equal to AAA - Class A . Isin code will be equal to US0000000001 . Contract size symbol will be equal to 1000 . Contract multiplier symbol will be equal to 1000
For the ex recycled contract symbol equal to BBB then EX RECYCLED . Underlyer isin code will be equal to US1234567891 . DisplayName will be equal to BBB - Class A . Isin code will be equal to US0000000002 . Contract size symbol will be equal to 100 . Contract multiplier symbol will be equal to 100
